) } const Sidebar = () => { const [activeLink,setActiveLink] = useState('students'); const messageDetails = { recieverName:'Harish', lastMessage :'Sir have you checked my assignment?', noOfMessages:3, time:'10:00pm' } const grpmessageDetails = { recieverName:'Group A', lastMessage :'Sir have you checked my assignment?', noOfMessages:3, time:'10:00pm' } return (
  • setActiveLink('all')}>All

) } export default Sidebar
